column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Its was long line to get a table. When I got there it was 1 hour waiting. Best way you get a table with less time is call ahead. This way you know how much time you have to wait and shorten the waiting time. Once you leave your phone number
column2: they will text you once table is ready.. Â you may not happy with waiting time BUT once you get a table
column3: you need to get ready for good food... Lagunitas A Little Sumpins' Sumpins' local beer was fruity and good. Malnati salad was really good.
